title: What I Do?
paragraph: I have an interest in software and game development, and I believe that the software being developed should be designed in such a way that it makes it easy for the client to use the software. The delivered software should have a similar structure for the user to have an easier learning curve.

title: Intentions
paragraph: I intend to work in an organisation that believes in gaining a competitive edge while giving back to the community. I am consistently learning and implementing the things I have learnt in my projects. I use my interpersonal skills while developing games and software to result in smoother user experience. I hope that my software and game development knowledge become a worthy asset to the business. As an individual, I consider myself as a person who thinks outside the box, funny and naturally passionate. I am a forward thinker, whom I could make people inspired when working as a team.
